casename: Shenyin Wangou-APS Management Pte ltd (formerly known as Shanghai International-APS Management Private Limited) and Another v Commerzbank (South-East Asia) Ltd
counsel: Fong Kwok Jen (Fong Partners & Associates) for the plaintiffs; Patrick Ang and Andrew Ang (Rajah & Tann) for the defendants
tags-parsed: Contract/Contractual terms/Implied terms/Necessity/Whether necessary to imply term allowing payment in alternative currency where Malaysian ringgit unavailable in off-shore market

Contract/Contractual terms/Interpretation of clause/Whether exchange control restrictions amount to 'politically related measures' allowing defendants to suspend payment plaintiffs in Malaysian ringgit on maturity of latter's ringgit-denominated off-shore account

Contract/Frustration/Imposition of exchange control restrictions/Eradication of off-shore market in Malaysian ringgit/Impossibility of performance of contract on maturity date/Whether contract frustrated/When frustration arises
